metas.description: All the betting and race information for the 2014 Grand Annual at the Cheltenham Festival.

page.content:
Cheltenham Festival Day 4 Races - Grand Annual Odds

We now come to the final race of the entire week and the Grand Annual Chase, this is a race for the more average chaser but it gives them and connections the chance to have a winner at the Cheltenham Festival. In 2010 we saw Pigeon Island cap a wonderful day for Nigel Twiston-Davies following Imperial Commander's win in the Cheltenham Gold Cup earlier on.

Punters will be looking for one last chance to get one over on the bookmakers in the Grand Annual so expect plenty of activity on the betting front; it has proved tough though with only one favourite winning the race since St Pirran in 2004. 

17:15 A.P. McCoy Grand Annual Handicap Chase (For The Johnny Henderson Challenge Cup) (Grade 3)
1.Next Sensation - M Scudamore - T Scudamore - 16/1
2.Eastlake - J O'Neill - P Carberry - 12/1
3.Croco Bay - B Case - K Woods - 14/1
4.Ned Buntline - N Meade - AP McCoy - 4/1JF
20 Ran

Grand Annual Result 2014

17:15 Johnny Henderson Grand Annual Chase Challenge Cup (Grade 3 Handicap)
1.Savello - A Martin - D Russell - 16/1
2.Ned Buntline - N Meade - P Carberry - 6/1JF
3.Claret Cloak - E Lavelle - N Fehily - 6/1JF
4.Next Sensation - M Scudamore - R Johnson - 7/1
24 Ran

17:15 Johnny Henderson Grand Annual Chase Challenge Cup (Grade 3 Handicap) (Class 1, 2m 110y)
1. Bellvano (P Carberry) 20/1
2. Tanks For That (B J Geraghty) 9/1
3. Kumbeshwar (R Thornton) 16/1
4. Anquetta (A Tinkler)  33/1
21 Ran
